Class MillGame

java.lang.Object
  MillGame

public class MillGame
extends java.lang.Object

This is the Class where pe play the game.The Game Model! Here we shall place the pieces on the board and respond to inputs.

Version:
1.0 (05-01-2014)
Author:
Buzea Vlad-Calin

          Method used in last Phase, when a player has exactly 3 pieces for jumping a Piece from a position to any other free position on the board

addPiece

public Piece addPiece(int x,
                      int y,
                      java.lang.String color)
               throws BadMoveException
This method is used to add a piece to the board, using board coordinates X and Y and piece Color.It returns the added piece.

Throws:
BadMoveException

detectAction

public void detectAction(int x,
                         int y)
dectectAction is the main acting method of the class (detect & action). It detects the game phase and Acts accordingly. The input parameters x and y are board(game matrix) coordinates, recieved from the control. It ties all the precedent methods together to form a whole program.

jumpTo

public Piece jumpTo(int x,
                    int y,
                    Piece selected)
             throws BadMoveException
Method used in last Phase, when a player has exactly 3 pieces for jumping a Piece from a position to any other free position on the board

Throws:
BadMoveException

selectPiece

public Piece selectPiece(int x,
                         int y,
                         java.lang.String color)
                  throws BadMoveException
Returns a piece selected from the board. The piece is selected through the parameters x , y. You must also specify the color for validation

Throws:
BadMoveException
